page.title: 14TRAVEL ABROAD/TOWN TWINNING
page.content: {SURVEY RESULTS}68% Gillingham people have travelled abroad.48% of these have visited France,36% Spain,23% Italy.Main purpose:holiday(usually organised package tours costing Â£100- 200 per head) 33% go abroad once a year, 16% go twice a year. {TOWN TWINNING}Gillingham twinned with {Le Neubourg,Normandy}in Nov 1977.First exchange was Easter 1978 when France was the host.We hosted later in same year.Soon small groups eg band,school, held specialised exchanges.Towns now alternate as hosts with 1 main exchange per year,when gifts eg glass, pottery are given.In 1984 50 English went to Le Neubourg.Events there included a civic reception & dance. 77% Gillingham people know that we have a town twin,but only 66% of these know that it is Le Neubourg.
